extension.summary: Screensaver that plays a video file
extension.description: Plays a video when the screensaver starts, this can be a custom video or one of the built in videos
extension.news: Upcoming Feature: - Set timer for single image v0.0.1: - Play any image (jpg, jpeg, png) and video (mp4, mkv) in same directory - Select Odd - Even week directories containing images and videos (Weekday changes on Monday) - Start Slide Show at 10, 20, 30 or 40 seconds (selection from settings)
